subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] I dont think name calling is aceptible

full_text:

Zack,

I do not meen to offend anyone but I do not think just because you a=
re a person who started this forum that you have the rite to insult and off=
end people for speaking there opinion.

Is that not what this and other gro=
ups are about. someone else said the rules here are if you are insulting or=
 mean then you will be baned does that not go for every one or is it just a=
 few people can say what they want and others will be baned ?

I said I did=
 not meen to insult anyone but I feel there is an injustuce here and favora=
tsm wich is wrong in any group.

why is it do as i say not as i do. the rul=
es should be for everyone no matter what. if you aply this thinking to ever=
y thing we would be living in a world were people were in prison for doing =
a crime and the people in goverment could do as they please to sell drugs o=
r kill or whatever and get away with it.

we should not have to be USED TO =
someone who can akt and insult who ever he wants too when ever he wants too=
.

that is my opinion.
pleese forgive my english.

John




_______________=
_________________
From: Zack Widup <w9sz.zack@...>
To: EVP-ITC@yahoog=
roups.com
Sent: Tuesday, August 18, 2009 9:08:34 AM
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] =
I dont think name calling is aceptible

=A0 
Well, it's his group (he doesn=
't own it now but he started it) and he's the one who invented the box and =
builds them and supplies us with all the info on them. His name is Frank Su=
mption.

Those of us who have been around here half of forever are used to =
him and aren't offended.

Zack


On Mon, Aug 17, 2009 at 6:48 PM, jba5656 <=
jba5656@yahoo. com> wrote:

=A0 
>I am sorry but I do not think it is acept=
ible for this FS to call someone a DICK for expessing an opinion or to say =
BITE ME to that person.
>
>on another group this would not be tolerated the=
 person would be warned on the group and then asked to leave. I have seen t=
his with a few people here and since I spoke up before I hope I will not be=
 insulted.
>
>I am sorry for my earlier post I do not wish to make enimies =
just learn.
>
>John
>
>
